verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Depart עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh [and] go up מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh, here אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְהָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am, hence thou and the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הֶֽעֱלִ֖יתָ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Li-ta which thou hast brought up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, unto the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which נִ֠שְׁבַּעְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> Nish-ba'-ti which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> u-le-ya-'a-Ko and to Jacob לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> le-zar-'a-Cha Unto thy seed אֶתְּנֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-te-Nen-nah. will I give

וְשָׁלַחְתִּ֥י <S%H7971><s%> ve-sha-lach-Ti And I will send לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha before מַלְאָ֑ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach; an angel וְגֵֽרַשְׁתִּ֗י <S%H1644><s%> ve-ge-rash-Ti, thee and I will drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanite הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, the Amorite וְהַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> ve-ha-chit-Ti and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi, and the Perizzite הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> ve-hay-vu-Si. and the Jebusite

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz Unto a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat flowing חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash; and honey כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֶֽעֱלֶ֜ה <S%H5927><s%> 'e-'e-Leh for I will not go up בְּקִרְבְּךָ֗ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-be-Cha, in the midst כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki because עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> ke-sheh- churlish עֹ֙רֶף֙ <S%H6203><s%> 'o-ref stiff-necked אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah, and I פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- might אֲכֶלְךָ֖ <S%H3615><s%> 'a-chel-Cha lest I consume בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> bad-Da-rech. thee in the way

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, And when the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var tidings הָרָ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' these evil הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this וַיִּתְאַבָּ֑לוּ <S%H56><s%> vai-yit-'ab-Ba-lu; they mourned וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not שָׁ֛תוּ <S%H7896><s%> Sha-tu did put אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish and no man עֶדְי֖וֹ <S%H5716><s%> ed-Yo on him his ornaments עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. and

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer had said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses אֱמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> ke-sheh- churlish עֹ֔רֶף <S%H6203><s%> 'O-ref, stiff-necked רֶ֧גַע <S%H7281><s%> Re-ga' moment אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad of thee in a אֶֽעֱלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> 'e-'e-Leh I will come up בְקִרְבְּךָ֖ <S%H7130><s%> ve-kir-be-Cha into the midst וְכִלִּיתִ֑יךָ <S%H3615><s%> ve-chil-li-Ti-cha; and consume וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now הוֹרֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> ho-Red thee therefore now put off עֶדְיְךָ֙ <S%H5716><s%> 'ed-ye-Cha thy ornaments מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lei-cha, and וְאֵדְעָ֖ה <S%H3045><s%> ve-'e-de-'Ah from thee that I may know מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> mah what אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-seh- what to do לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַיִּֽתְנַצְּל֧וּ <S%H5337><s%> vai-yit-natz-tze-Lu stripped בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֶדְיָ֖ם <S%H5716><s%> 'ed-Yam themselves of their ornaments מֵהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> me-Har by the mount חוֹרֵֽב׃ <S%H2722><s%> cho-Rev. Horeb

וּמֹשֶׁה֩ <S%H4872><s%> u-mo-Sheh And Moses יִקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֹ֜הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel the tabernacle וְנָֽטָה־ <S%H5186><s%> ve-na-tah- and pitched ל֣וֹ׀ lo מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz it without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh, the camp הַרְחֵק֙ <S%H7368><s%> har-Chek afar off מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, from the camp וְקָ֥רָא <S%H7121><s%> ve-Ka-ra and called ל֖וֹ lo אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel it the Tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and everyone מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Kesh And it came to pass [that] every one which sought יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD יֵצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel unto the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed, of the congregation אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz which [was] without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Lam-ma-cha-Neh. the camp

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, came כְּצֵ֤את <S%H3318><s%> ke-Tzet went out מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And it came to pass when Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel, unto the tabernacle יָק֙וּמוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Ku-mu rose up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, [that] all the people וְנִ֨צְּב֔וּ <S%H5324><s%> ve-Nitz-tze-Vu, and stood אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach door אָהֳל֑וֹ <S%H168><s%> o-ho-Lo; [at] his tent וְהִבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <S%H5027><s%> ve-hib-Bi-tu and looked אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּא֖וֹ <S%H935><s%> bo-'O until he was gone הָאֹֽהֱלָה׃ <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-he-lah. into the tabernacle

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, become כְּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> ke-Vo entered מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And it came to pass as Moses הָאֹ֔הֱלָה <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-he-lah, into the tabernacle יֵרֵד֙ <S%H3381><s%> ye-Red descended עַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> 'am-Mud pillar הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> he-'a-Nan, the cloudy וְעָמַ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> ve-'a-Mad and stood פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach [at] the door הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel; of the tabernacle וְדִבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-Ber and [the LORD] talked עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. with Moses

וְרָאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'Ah saw כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> 'am-Mud pillar הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> he-'a-Nan, the cloudy עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med stand פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach door הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel; [at] the tabernacle וְקָ֤ם <S%H6965><s%> ve-Kam rose up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and all the people וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֔וּ <S%H7812><s%> ve-hish-ta-chav-Vu, and worshipped אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach door אָהֳלֽוֹ׃ <S%H168><s%> o-ho-Lo. [in] his tent

וְדִבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses פָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nim face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פָּנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nim, to face כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber speaketh אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish as a man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu; unto his friend וְשָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav And he turned again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, into the camp וּמְשָׁ֨רְת֜וֹ <S%H8334><s%> u-me-Sha-re-To but his servant יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נוּן֙ <S%H5126><s%> nun of Nun נַ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar, a young man לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָמִ֖ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> ya-Mish departed מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch not out הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel. of the tabernacle ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD רְ֠אֵה <S%H7200><s%> Re-'eh See אַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You אֹמֵ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mer thou sayest אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me הַ֚עַל <S%H5927><s%> Ha-'al unto me Bring up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not הֽוֹדַעְתַּ֔נִי <S%H3045><s%> ho-da'-Ta-ni, and thou hast not let me know אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom תִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> tish-Lach whom thou wilt send עִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi; with וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah You אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ta with me Yet thou hast said יְדַעְתִּ֣יךָֽ <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Ti-cha I know בְשֵׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem, thee by name וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- have also מָצָ֥אתָ <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ta and thou hast also found חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nai. in my sight

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if נָא֩ <S%H4994><s%> na pray מָצָ֨אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti Now therefore I pray thee if I have found חֵ֜ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha, in thy sight הוֹדִעֵ֤נִי <S%H3045><s%> ho-di-'E-ni shew נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na pray אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּרָכֶ֔ךָ <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Che-cha, me now thy way וְאֵדָ֣עֲךָ֔ <S%H3045><s%> ve-'e-Da-'a-cha, that I may know לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> 'em-tza- thee that I may find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha; in thy sight וּרְאֵ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh and consider כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha [is] thy people הַגּ֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> hag-Goy that this nation הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this
